name: I Don't Think It's a UFO, Aloysius. It's Got Teeth!
name_original: I Don't Think It's a UFO, Aloysius. It's Got Teeth!
description:
I Don’t Think It’s a UFO, Aloysius. It’s Got Teeth is a 2D side scrolling adventure through space as you guide Aloysius and his brother Mortimer home whilst a toothy assailant attempts to abduct the hapless Mortimer. Fortunately, Aloysius is armed with his mighty beans that can be thrown at the UFO to knock out its tractor beam and save Mort.

This game was developed for an intro CS course I took in February of 2020 and is my first foray into game dev. It is super simple, buggy, and poorly made, however it exists here solely to gauge my progress as a developer and provide context as to why the UFO in the space shooter game I'll be releasing soon has teeth.
